title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe that the height of the label is not changed.
OB: The label height does not change when the font size is modified in the UI.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe that the height of the label is not changed.
